sentences.en: Brian McClair nodded in his twenty-third goal of the season.
sentences.cn: 布赖恩·麦克莱尔头球攻入了自己本赛季第23粒进球。

sentences.en: By mid-season the hostility between the two was undisguised.
sentences.cn: 赛季过半时，双方之间的敌意已经公开化了。

sentences.en: Chamberlain scored 50 or more points four times in the season.
sentences.cn: 张伯伦在赛季中有4次得分不低于50。

sentences.en: Football clubs have been busy in the close season transfer market.
sentences.cn: 足球俱乐部在休赛季节的转会市场上一直忙个不停。

sentences.en: He has coached and played in Italy during the Australian off-season.
sentences.cn: 他趁澳大利亚的休赛期在意大利执教并参加比赛。

sentences.en: He's the best opponent I've come across this season, a great player.
sentences.cn: 他是我本赛季遇到的最出色的对手，一位了不起的运动员。

sentences.en: His name has cropped up at every selection meeting this season.
sentences.cn: 他的名字突然出现在这一季所有选举会议上。

sentences.en: I can personally attest that the cold and flu season is here.
sentences.cn: 感冒和流感季节来了，对此我有切身体会。

sentences.en: Nick Sullivan previews this season's collections from Paris and Milan.
sentences.cn: 尼克·沙利文对这一季来自巴黎和米兰的时装系列作了预评。

sentences.en: Only two go down at the end of this season.
sentences.cn: 本赛季末只有两支队伍降级。

sentences.en: Season with salt, pepper and a pinch of cayenne.
sentences.cn: 调以盐、胡椒和少许辣椒粉。

sentences.en: the effect on plants as the seasons start to change
The population explodes to 40,000 during the tourist season.
sentences.cn: 旅游季节，人口激增至4万。

sentences.en: This season the club has had 73,500 season-ticket holders.
sentences.cn: 本赛季该俱乐部已经有73,500名持有季票的观众。

sentences.en: Three million people will visit theatres in the annual six-week season.
sentences.cn: 在每年为期6周的戏剧季里，会有300万人去看戏。

sentences.en: To stay fit off season, I play tennis or football.
sentences.cn: 为了在休赛期间保持状态，我常打网球或踢足球。

words.tran_cn: 应时的；合时的；适合于季节的
季节的；周期性的；依照季节的
经验丰富的；老练的；调过味的
调味品；调味的人；使用调味物的人
调味品；佐料；风干；增添趣味的东西

phrases.tran_cn: 繁殖期；繁殖季节；生殖季
生长期，生育期；生长季节
不合时宜的：不在合适的或正确的时间的；不凑巧的
致以节日的问候（圣诞或新年时的问候语）

trans.tran_cn: 季节，季，时期，活动期，时令，暂时
trans.tran_en: one of the main periods into which a year is divided, each of which has a particular type of weather. The seasons are spring, summer, autumn, and winter
one of the main periods into which a year is divided, each of which has a particular type of weather. The seasons are spring, summer, autumn, and winter
to add salt, pepper etc to food you are cooking
